original_text: And the angels who did not stay within their own position of authority, but left their proper dwelling, he has kept in eternal chains under gloomy darkness until the judgment of the great day—
korean_text: 또 자기 지위를 지키지 아니하고 자기 처소를 떠난 천사들을 큰 날의 심판까지 영원한 결박으로 흑암에 가두셨으며

sentences.original_text: And the angels who did not stay within their own position of authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기들의 권위의 자리를 지키지 않은 천사들은

sentences.original_text: until the judgment of the great day
